title: Competency-Based Extended Flipped Learning Curriculum for Minimally Invasive Surgery (MIS)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical knowledge and understanding of surgical procedures
context.additional_context: Hands-On Instructional Environment Supported by Digital Devices

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 85% proficiency in performing each step of core MIS procedures (e.g., laparoscopic surgery) through extended flipped learning.
Improve collaborative communication (Team-STEPPS) competencies within surgical teams by 30% compared to pre-evaluation through team-based simulation.
Achieve an average score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) across five OSATS (Objective Structured Assessment of Technical Skills) criteria, including instrument handling and accuracy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
